events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position early this morning, highlighting strong experience in backend development.
Application has been reviewed and categorized under the 'Engineering' cluster based on skills in software development and DevOps.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to the candidate to manage the next recruitment steps and communications.
Conducted the initial phone screening; candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software architecture and cloud services.
Received positive response from the candidate agreeing to proceed to the technical interview stage next week.
Technical interview with the lead dev team has been scheduled for May 8th at 3 PM UTC, confirming candidate availability.
